Class Container

  • java.lang.Object
    • Container
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    City, JoinScreen, Map, PlayerHand, Route, ServerScreen, TextField, UIButton, UITextInput

    class Container
extends java.lang.Object
    The container class that many objects extend, it contains variables for postion, rotation, achoring and texturing as well as a list of child containers that are connected to it

        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the container
        y - the y coordinate of the container
        width - the width of the container
        height - the height of the container
        rotation - the rotation around the anchor point (in radians) of the container
        texture - the image object to texture the container with

    • Method Detail

      • mouseOver

        public boolean mouseOver()
        Check if the mouse is contained within the container, accounts for anchoring and rotation
        Returns:
        True if the mouse is inside the container, false if not

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Container obj)
        Check if the container is equivalent to another container object
        Parameters:
        obj - the container obj to be compared to
        Returns:
        True if they are equivalent, false if not

      • getPos

        public double[] getPos()
        Get the current position of the container
        Returns:
